songs.title: Ayyy
songs.lyrics:
Check, check, check, one, one, one, one, two
Kool A.D., best rapper in the world
Hey, turn it up, bitch, it's lit
Cock the Glock, hit a lit
It's time to get real, time to eat a meal, [?]
Cut throat, methodologies, employ
Deploy criminological tactics
On the wackness, (what?) I go batshit
Loco, insane in the membrane, baby
Drop a mixtape now
You a rapper now
Start your own horoscope advice column in paper magazine
Receive a handsome paycheck for it
Say some more words, why not?
Existence is hustle and flow, baby
I bet you thirst, swag, swag, swag
I'm an animal, uh, see these ice creams?
[?]
Have a nice dream, et cetera
The most heavenly, extraterrestrial, Kool A.D., animal, vegetable, mineral, so young, dinner roll, --
Get buttered up, yup, such and such
Uh, style like that of a flower of buttercup
Think I said it, like, 3-4-7 8 times 7, 9/11
Peace, Allah, ja, Rastafaray
Everybody up in heaven, plus Earth
All things is everything
Everything is everything
